text: pala āṇkaḷ irukkiṉṟaṉar. Avarkaḷuṭaiya varttakamum koṭukkal vāṅkalum avarkaḷ allāhvuṭaiya tiruppeyarai niṉaivu ceyvatil iruntum, toḻukaiyai uṟutiyāka kaṭaipiṭippatiliruntum, jakāttuk koṭuppatiliruntum avarkaḷait tiruppiviṭātu. Uḷḷaṅkaḷum pārvaikaḷum (payattāl tiṭukkiṭṭut) taṭumāṟiviṭakkūṭiya nāḷaip paṟṟi avarkaḷ (ennēramum) payantu koṇṭiruppārkaḷ
